items.sentence: Quite of few of the children didn\'t look happy.
I thought I told you not to talk to my daughter.
You and Tom are the best friends I\'ve ever had.
Tom wondered how fast Mary could climb a ladder.
I\'ve already told the police everything I know.
I\'ve always known this would happen eventually.
Tom and Mary are pretty miserable, aren\'t they?
I don\'t know whether Tom told the truth or not.
There\'s no reason for you not to tell Tom that.
Tom kept telling everybody that it wasn\'t true.
